sqlQuery.name: SQL1
sqlQuery.sqlText:
select acc_desc "Code", substring(datename(month, ma),1,3) + ' '+ datename(year, ma) "Month", ma "smonth", wcnt "WO Cnt"
from
(select convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121) ma from dual union select dateadd(month, 1,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 2,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 3,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 4,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 5,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 6,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 7,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 8,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 9,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 10,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 11,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual) a
left outer join
(select acc_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date) mth, count(*) wcnt from r5actioncodes inner join r5events on acc_code = evt_action inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where acc_code in (#promptmany('SEL_ACTION')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by acc_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)
union select cau_desc , cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date), count(*) from r5causes inner join r5events on cau_code = evt_cause inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where cau_code in (#promptmany('SEL_CAUSE')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by cau_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)
union select fal_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date), count(*) from r5failures inner join r5events on fal_code = evt_failure inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where fal_code in (#promptmany('SEL_FAILURE')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by fal_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)
union select rqm_desc , cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date) , count(*) from r5requircodes inner join r5events on rqm_code = evt_reqm inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where rqm_code in (#promptmany('SEL_PROBLEM')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by rqm_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date) )d
on mth = ma
where ma <= convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_END')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)

sqlQuery.name: SQL2
sqlQuery.sqlText:
select acc_desc "Code", substring(datename(month, ma),1,3) + ' '+ datename(year, ma) "Month", ma "smonth", wcnt "WO Cnt"
from
(select convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121) ma from dual union select dateadd(month, 1,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 2,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 3,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 4,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 5,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 6,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 7,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 8,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 9,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 10,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual union select dateadd(month, 11,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)) from dual) a
left outer join
(select acc_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date) mth, count(*) wcnt from r5actioncodes inner join r5events on acc_code = evt_action inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where acc_code in (#promptmany('SEL_ACTION')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by acc_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)
union select cau_desc , cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date), count(*) from r5causes inner join r5events on cau_code = evt_cause inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where cau_code in (#promptmany('SEL_CAUSE')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by cau_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)
union select fal_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date), count(*) from r5failures inner join r5events on fal_code = evt_failure inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where fal_code in (#promptmany('SEL_FAILURE')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by fal_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)
union select rqm_desc , cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date) , count(*) from r5requircodes inner join r5events on rqm_code = evt_reqm inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where rqm_code in (#promptmany('SEL_PROBLEM')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by rqm_desc, cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date) )d
on mth = ma
where ma <= convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_END')#,1,7)+'-01', 121)

sqlQuery.name: SQL3
sqlQuery.sqlText:
select acc_desc "Code", cast(ma as nvarchar) "Year", wcnt "WO Cnt"
from
(select year(convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121) ) ma from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 12,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 24,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 36,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 48,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 60,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 72,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 84,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 96,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 108,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual ) a
left outer join
(select acc_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)) mth, count(*) wcnt from r5actioncodes inner join r5events on acc_code = evt_action inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where acc_code in (#promptmany('SEL_ACTION')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by acc_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date))
union select cau_desc , year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)), count(*) from r5causes inner join r5events on cau_code = evt_cause inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where cau_code in (#promptmany('SEL_CAUSE')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by cau_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date))
union select fal_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)), count(*) from r5failures inner join r5events on fal_code = evt_failure inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where fal_code in (#promptmany('SEL_FAILURE')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by fal_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date))
union select rqm_desc , year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)), count(*) from r5requircodes inner join r5events on rqm_code = evt_reqm inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where rqm_code in (#promptmany('SEL_PROBLEM')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by rqm_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)) )d
on mth = ma
where ma <= year(convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_END')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))

sqlQuery.name: SQL3
sqlQuery.sqlText:
select acc_desc "Code", cast(ma as nvarchar) "Year", wcnt "WO Cnt"
from
(select year(convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121) ) ma from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 12,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 24,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 36,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 48,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 60,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 72,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 84,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 96,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual union select year(dateadd(month, 108,convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_START')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))) from dual ) a
left outer join
(select acc_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)) mth, count(*) wcnt from r5actioncodes inner join r5events on acc_code = evt_action inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where acc_code in (#promptmany('SEL_ACTION')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by acc_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date))
union select cau_desc , year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)), count(*) from r5causes inner join r5events on cau_code = evt_cause inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where cau_code in (#promptmany('SEL_CAUSE')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by cau_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date))
union select fal_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)), count(*) from r5failures inner join r5events on fal_code = evt_failure inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where fal_code in (#promptmany('SEL_FAILURE')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by fal_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date))
union select rqm_desc , year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)), count(*) from r5requircodes inner join r5events on rqm_code = evt_reqm inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where rqm_code in (#promptmany('SEL_PROBLEM')#) and dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM') group by rqm_desc, year(cast((evt_completed - day(evt_completed) )+ 1 as date)) )d
on mth = ma
where ma <= year(convert(date, substring(#prompt('SEL_END')#,1,7)+'-01', 121))

sqlQuery.name: SQL5
sqlQuery.sqlText: select mrc_desc, mrc_code from r5mrcs where 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or mrc_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#)

sqlQuery.name: SQL5
sqlQuery.sqlText: select cls_code, cls_desc from r5classes where cls_rentity = 'OBJ'

sqlQuery.name: SQL5
sqlQuery.sqlText: select uco_code, uco_desc from r5ucodes where uco_rentity = 'JBTP'

sqlQuery.name: SQL5
sqlQuery.sqlText: select rqm_code, rqm_desc from r5requircodes inner join r5events on rqm_code = evt_reqm inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM')

sqlQuery.name: SQL5
sqlQuery.sqlText: select cau_code, cau_desc from r5causes inner join r5events on cau_code = evt_cause inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM')

sqlQuery.name: SQL5
sqlQuery.sqlText: select fal_code, fal_desc from r5failures inner join r5events on fal_code = evt_failure inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM')

sqlQuery.name: SQL5
sqlQuery.sqlText: select acc_code, acc_desc from r5actioncodes inner join r5events on acc_code = evt_action inner join r5objects on obj_code = evt_object and obj_org = evt_object_org where dbo.repgetcompdate(evt_completed) between #prompt('SEL_START')# and #prompt('SEL_END')# and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) or obj_class in (#promptmany('SEL_CLASS')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) or evt_mrc in (#promptmany('SEL_MRC')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) or evt_org in (#promptmany('SEL_ORG')#) ) and ( 'All' in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) or evt_jobtype in (#promptmany('SEL_JBTP')#) ) and evt_type in ('JOB', 'PPM')

sqlQuery.name: SQL6
sqlQuery.sqlText: select convert(datetime, #prompt('SEL_START')#, 121) startdate, convert(datetime, #prompt('SEL_END')#, 121) enddate from dual
